title: Insulin-like growth factor-2 mRNA-binding protein 2 facilitates post-ischemic angiogenesis by increasing the stability of fibroblast growth factor 2 mRNA and its protein expression
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Shuai Ma, Yiqing Hu, Wangguo Xu, Weidong Xiong, Xinyu Xu, Yajie Hou, Ying Wang, Panke Chen, Wenbi Yang, Hao Lu, Yongchao Zhao
